sections.title: Service Charge Calculation Help
sections.intro: The Service Charge Calculation page displays how service charges are distributed among employees for each event.

features.title: Automatic Calculation
features.description: Service charges are calculated and distributed automatically when the page loads

features.title: Month Filter
features.description: Filter service charge records by specific time periods
bullets: Use month dropdown to filter records
Select 'All Months' to view entire year
Table updates automatically

features.title: Summary Cards
bullets: Total Distributed: Sum of all service charges
Total Events: Number of unique events

features.title: Reading the Table
bullets: Records grouped by event
Columns: EVENT, SC ID, EMPLOYEE, ROLE, EVENT BUDGET, AMOUNT, DATE, CUSTOMER

notes.title: Analysis Tips
bullets: Use month filter to analyze seasonal distributions
Verify event budgets against allocations
Check roles for accurate charge distribution

sections.title: Salary Deduction Records Help
sections.intro: The Salary Deduction Records page allows you to manage, track, and analyze salary deductions for employees.

features.title: Managing Deductions
features.description: Add, edit, or remove deduction entries
bullets: Add New: Fill form and click 'Save Deduction'
Edit: Click edit icon to update existing entries
Delete: Click delete icon and confirm

features.title: Monthly Calculation
bullets: Select employees and month
Click 'Calculate' to compute total
Click 'Total' to view history

features.title: Viewing History
bullets: Modal shows employees ID, month, and total deduction
Use for payroll auditing
Export for record keeping

features.title: Deduction Table
bullets: Columns: Employee ID, Date, Description, Amount (LKR), Actions
Sort by date or amount
Search specific deductions

notes.title: Best Practices
bullets: Document reasons for all deductions
Verify amounts with HR policies
Double-check before saving

sections.title: Pay Management Help
sections.intro: The Pay Management page is your central dashboard for calculating, reviewing, and notifying employees about monthly payroll.

features.title: Payroll Processing
bullets: Select month using date picker
Click 'Calculate Payroll' to process
System computes: Basic Salary + Service Charge - Deductions

features.title: Employee Notifications
bullets: Notify All: Send emails to all employees
Individual Send: Resend to specific employees
Email Status: Track delivery status

features.title: Payroll Table
bullets: Columns: Name/ID, Basic Salary, Service Charge %, Service Charge Amount, Deductions, Net Salary, Email Status
Footer shows Total Net Payroll
Color-coded status indicators

notes.title: Workflow Tips
bullets: Always calculate payroll before notifying
Resend failed emails individually
Verify net amounts against company policies

sections.title: Payment History Management Help
sections.intro: The Payment History page allows you to view, search, filter, and export payroll records for all employees.

features.title: Search and Filter
bullets: Search by employees name or ID
Filter by employees, month, and year
Click 'Clear filters' to reset

features.title: Grouped View
bullets: Records grouped by month and year
Color-coded headers for navigation
Chronological sorting

features.title: Detailed Records
bullets: Columns: Employee, Period, Base Salary, Service Charge, Deductions, Net Salary, Payment Date
Hover for additional details
Responsive design for all devices

features.title: Export to PDF
bullets: Click 'Export to PDF' for filtered records
Report includes watermark and company logo
Footer with contact info and page numbers

notes.title: Reporting Tips
bullets: Filter before exporting for focused reports
Use for annual audits and compliance
Save PDFs for long-term record keeping
